channel.title: Tops on WHW's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Tops on WHW's blog

item.description: About I’m Wei-Hsiang (Matt) Wang from Taiwan. I’m currently a Backend Engineer at Umbo Computer Vision focusing primarily on the development of realtime detection pipeline in Python & Node.js. I’m also a volunteer developer in PyCon TW and lead a 10-people team establishing the website of PyCon TW 2021 Conference in Django & Vue.js. Before working in UmboCV, I received both of my B.S. (2016) & M.S. (2018) in Mechanical Engineering from National Taiwan University (NTU) , where I conducted the research in mechanism design & patent analysis.
